attributes.action: 3rd EU referendum against the 2nd EU referendum against the 1St EU referendum
attributes.additional_details: Democracy in western civilisation is being threatened by the EU remain campaign not accepting a democratic vote. Therefore, should the remain Camp be allowed a second EU referendum against the first EU referendum a third EU referendum must be allowed as part of a democratic process.
attributes.background: In the event of a second EU referendum being accepted, and in the event of a Remain win, I propose a third EU referendum based on the fact that the second EU referendum was allowed to take place. This being based on a democratic basis.
